name: Winter of Goodbyes
description:
There’s things I want to say. People drift apart when they go to college, I know that much. I don’t want to miss this chance.

To tell her how I feel.

Mia and Lily are best friends finishing the final leg of their road trip. They're settled into a rented cabin for the evening, and the heaviness of reality and life is weighing on both of them.

It's time for Mia to finally confront her own feelings for her best friend: as the conversation dwindles, it's time to make a decision.
